title: State of Decay - Modded & Walking Dead Mod
description:
Howdy bay peoples,

-This does not contain the DLC (Breakdown & Lifeline) so the mods would work properly, the new updates made several mods broken/incompatible, I just happen to have a cracked older one with mods and decided to share.

State of Decay is my favorite zombie/survival game of all time.
So it made sense to upload it for everyone to enjoy with all kinds of mods.

There are no installation instructions, simply unpack & play! :)
Crack and so on is already applied.

Read this entire description for the keybinds & mods that are included.

NOTE: You MIGHT need to edit where the executable is located, wherever you unpacked the RAR, go into the "State of Decay" folder & open "Class3", then change the line: "Executable: ......" to where the game's EXE is located (same map where Class3 is located)

Much greetings & enjoy.
ExtremeModder



Mod Keybinds:
----------------------------------

Spawn Vehicles:
4) Old school muscle car
5) Dukes of Hazard muscle car
6) Sedan
7) Black pickup
8) Red pickup
9) Military pickup
0) Police car
P) Hatchback
O) Yellow hatchback
I) Military humvee
K) Ambulance
L) Black SUV

Hold: ? / for DebugMenu:
F1) Makes zombies not able to attack
F2) Makes them attack again
F3) Shows all infestations on the map
F4) Spawn zombie
F5) Kill all zombies
F6) Disable zombies
F7) Enable zombies
F8) Get player position
F9) Unlimited health & stamina
F10) Disable unlimited health & stamina
F11) Access base storage locker

MasterClock:
N) Make time go forward
H) Change clock format or make it go away


Mods Included:
----------------------------------
-Walking Dead Character Pack
-Black SUV Mod
-Chris Kennedy's Mods (Changes some wallpapers & town signs)
-Improved Artillery Strikes (Makes them actually worthwhile to use)
-Some upgraded home bases
-In-game debug tool (Cheat menu, basically)
-MasterClock (See the time & change it)
-Nag No More (Less Lily talking)
-No Glowing Zombie Eyes
-No Intro Cinematic
-NPCs Use Guns (NPCs will actually now use guns if you are with them)
-Vehicle re-textures
-Phacops's vehicles (Changes the look of some vehicles)
-You Got A Fast Car (Makes cars go faster & more realistic)


Modded By Me:
----------------------------------
-Ammunition is MUCH more plentiful, around 6x more ammo per bullet
-Free radio usage
-More radio options
-Lots of items tweaked
-And much more (see in-game)
